Name: Looker Studio
description_c: Google's free data visualization platform for creating comprehensive PPC reports and dashboards. Connect data from Google Ads, Analytics, and other sources to build automated reporting solutions.

Name: SEMrush
description_c: All-in-one digital marketing toolkit with powerful PPC features including competitor ad analysis, keyword research, and campaign optimization insights across Google Ads and social platforms.

Name: Google Ads
description_c: Google's primary advertising platform for creating and managing search, display, video, and shopping campaigns. Essential tool for reaching customers across Google's network.

Name: Facebook Ads Manager
Tags: social media ads,facebook ads,instagram ads,audience targeting
description_c: Meta's comprehensive advertising platform for creating and managing campaigns across Facebook, Instagram, and Audience Network. Advanced targeting and creative tools for social media advertising.

Name: Microsoft Advertising
description_c: Microsoft's advertising platform for Bing search and partner sites. Often provides lower cost-per-click and less competition than Google Ads, with unique audience demographics.

Name: Ahrefs
description_c: Advanced SEO and PPC research tool with comprehensive keyword data, competitor analysis, and content gap analysis. Essential for campaign planning and competitive intelligence.
